statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT id, customer_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT customer_name, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY sale_date
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE access_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, price, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%bike%' ORDER BY sales_date ASC, price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(price) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE access_level = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 3;

SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT username, role FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE roles.role_name = 'Admin';
